"The A.R.K.S. Support System": "The \"A.R.K.S. Support System\" triggers <c 00ffff>when the Ship as a whole has made sufficient progress on a strategy by defeating the target<c>."

"When the operation progress percentage reaches a certain value, the A.R.K.S. support system grants all players a power boost.

This effect will last until the end of the quest.

Combine your power as ARKS and defeat the target!"
